description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ever wish you could check to see if your controller is working properly? Now you can with Controller Doctor! Perform over 10 tests that examine your controller's buttons, thumb sticks and triggers!
description.short: Ever wish you could check to see if your controller is working properly? Now you can with Controller Doctor! Perform over 10 tests that examine your controller's buttons, thumb sticks and triggers!
